chat.server

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat.common.AbstractState
      • chat.server.State

  • public class State
extends AbstractState
    This class defines the state of the server.
    Author:
    Denis Conan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Map<SelectionKey,FullDuplexMsgWorker> allClientWorkers
      selection keys of the client message workers.
      Map<SelectionKey,FullDuplexMsgWorker> allServerWorkers
      selection keys of the server message workers.
      Map<Integer,Integer> clientSeqNumbers
      one counter per client in order to control the propagation of client messages: stop forward to remote servers when the message has already been forwarded ; the counter is set by the server receiving the message from the client.
      SelectionKey currKey
      selection key of the connection from which the last message was received.
      int seqNumber
      seqNumber is equal to the maximum of counters of clientSeqNumbers set.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      State(int identity)
      initialises the collection attributes.

    • Field Detail

      • allServerWorkers

        public Map<SelectionKey,FullDuplexMsgWorker> allServerWorkers
        selection keys of the server message workers.

      • allClientWorkers

        public Map<SelectionKey,FullDuplexMsgWorker> allClientWorkers
        selection keys of the client message workers.

      • currKey

        public SelectionKey currKey
        selection key of the connection from which the last message was received.

      • clientSeqNumbers

        public Map<Integer,Integer> clientSeqNumbers
        one counter per client in order to control the propagation of client messages: stop forward to remote servers when the message has already been forwarded ; the counter is set by the server receiving the message from the client.

      • seqNumber

        public int seqNumber
        seqNumber is equal to the maximum of counters of clientSeqNumbers set.

    • Constructor Detail

        public State(int identity)
        initialises the collection attributes.
        Parameters:
        identity - the identity of this server.
